title: Pomegranate and feta salad
ingredients: ['285g mixed baby leaf greens', '1 pomegranate, peeled and seeds separated', '225g crumbled feta cheese', '1 lemon, zested and juiced', '1 teaspoon Dijon mustard', '3 tablespoons red wine vinegar', '3 tablespoons extra-virgin olive oil', 'salt and pepper to taste']
